multiplechoiceresponse.label: What is the difference between try-catch and try-catch-finally blocks?
multiplechoiceresponse.description: You can add an optional tip or note related to the prompt like this.

choicegroup.choice: Try-catch-finally blocks always execute the finally block, regardless of whether an exception is thrown.
Try-catch blocks can only handle one exception type, while try-catch-finally blocks can handle multiple.
Try-catch-finally blocks are more efficient than try-catch blocks.
There is no difference between try-catch and try-catch-finally blocks.
